name: Balanced OptiML Script
description: Applying undersampling techniques for datasets that contain a rare class before building OptiMLs. The result is a list of OptiMLs built on a collection of undersampled datasets and the unbalanced test data to do the final evaluation.

inputs.name: objective-field
inputs.description: The name or id of the categorical field

inputs.name: training-rate
inputs.description: The rate of instances to be used in training (default = 0.8)

inputs.name: number-of-samples
inputs.description: Number of undersampled OptiMLs to be built

inputs.name: proportion
inputs.description: Proportion between the non-rare instances to be sampled to the rare instances

inputs.name: metric
inputs.description: Evaluation metric that will guide the optimization

outputs.name: undersampled-optimls
outputs.description: List of OptiMLs built on undersampled datasets

outputs.name: unbalanced-test-ds
outputs.description: Test dataset to be used for final evaluations
